Package index

Package

Package description

mapsf-package mapsf
Package description

Symbology

These functions display cartographic layers.

mf_map()
Plot a map
mf_label()
Plot labels
mf_raster()
Plot a raster
mf_graticule()
Plot graticules

Map Layout

These functions are dedicated to the map layout design.

mf_theme()
Set a theme
mf_shadow()
Plot a shadow
mf_background()
Plot a background image
mf_legend()
Plot a legend
mf_annotation()
Plot an annotation
mf_arrow()
Plot a north arrow
mf_credits()
Plot credits
mf_layout()
Plot a map layout
mf_title()
Plot a title
mf_scale()
Plot a scale bar
mf_inset_on() mf_inset_off()
Plot an inset
mf_worldmap()
Plot a point on a world map

Utility Functions

These functions are useful for some utility tasks.

mf_export()
Export a map
mf_distr()
Plot a distribution
mf_get_links()
Get a link layer from a data.frame of links
mf_get_pal()
Get color palettes
mf_get_breaks()
Get class intervals
mf_get_mtq()
Get the 'mtq' dataset
mf_get_ratio()
Get map width and height values
mf_get_pencil()
Get a pencil layer from polygons
mf_get_borders()
Get a border layer from polygons

On this page

Developed by Timothée Giraud.
